00035 namespace egui { namespace detail {
00036 
00037 typedef boost::function1< window_top * , wnd_id_type> create_window_from_handle_func;
00038 
00039 struct window_internal_info {
00040     window_internal_info() : old_wnd_proc(0), old_dlg_proc(0) {}
00041 
00042     WNDPROC old_wnd_proc;
00043     DLGPROC old_dlg_proc;
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct thread_info {
00047     thread_info() : create_hook(0), getmsg_hook(0) {}
00048     HHOOK create_hook;
00049     HHOOK getmsg_hook;
00050 };
00051 
00052 struct window_manager {
00053 
00054     static window_manager & inst() ;
00055 protected:
00056     window_manager() ;
00057     window_manager(const window_manager&);
00058 
00059 
00060 public:
00061     void add_create_window_from_handle_func(create_window_from_handle_func func) ;
00062 
00063     wnd<> create_window_from_id(wnd_id_type h);
00064     wnd<> existing_window_from_id(wnd_id_type h);
00065     void add_created_wnd(window_top * w);
00066 
00067     void add_form( HWND h);
00068     void del_form( HWND h);
00069     bool is_form( HWND h) const;
00070 
00071     string lo_class_name(HWND h) const;
00072     
00073     window_internal_info internal_info(HWND h) const;
00074     void internal_info(HWND h, const window_internal_info & info) ;
00075 
00076     void erase_window_info( HWND h);
00077 
00078     void register_thread_hooks();
00079     void unregister_thread_hooks();
00080 
00081     thread_info current_thread_info() const;
00082 
00083     void add_callback(void * cb);
00084     void del_callback(void * cb);
00085     bool has_callback(void * cb) const;
00086 
00087     typedef std::set<HINSTANCE> win32_module_set;
00088     void add_win32_module(HINSTANCE module);
00089     win32_module_set get_win32_modules() const;
00090 
00091     HINSTANCE find_instance_having_resource(int id, const char_* resource_type) ;
00092 
00093     void add_non_intrusive_handler_ptr(non_intrusive_handler_ptr p);
00094 
00095 private:
00096     wnd<> create_window_from_handle(wnd_id_type h);
00097 
00098 private:
00099     mutable critical_section m_cs;
00100 
00101     typedef std::map< wnd_id_type, wnd<> > wnd_coll;
00102     // the C++ window objects
00103     wnd_coll m_wnds;
00104 
00105     // internal information for the C++ windows
00106     typedef std::map< wnd_id_type, window_internal_info> internal_info_coll;
00107     internal_info_coll m_internal_infos;
00108 
00109     // when we ask for a window corresponding to an HWND, and that window doesn't yet exist,
00110     // we invoke the creators - until one creator actually creates the window
00111     typedef std::vector<create_window_from_handle_func> creator_array;
00112     creator_array m_creators;
00113 
00114     // these are the handles of the windows we know are dialogs (forms)
00115     std::set<HWND> m_forms;
00116 
00117     typedef std::map<DWORD, thread_info> thread_info_coll;
00118     thread_info_coll m_threads;
00119 
00120     typedef std::set<void*> callback_set;
00121     callback_set m_callbacks;
00122 
00123     typedef std::set<HINSTANCE> win32_module_set;
00124     win32_module_set m_win32_modules;
00125 
00126     typedef std::vector<non_intrusive_handler_ptr> non_intrusive_handler_ptr_array;
00127     non_intrusive_handler_ptr_array m_non_intrusive_handlers;
00128 };
